class.rdfs:comment: The act of editing a recipient by replacing an old object with a new object.
class.rdfs:label: ReplaceAction

schema:replacee.rdfs:comment: A sub property of object. The object that is being replaced.
schema:replacee.rdfs:label: replacee

schema:replacer.rdfs:comment: A sub property of object. The object that replaces.
schema:replacer.rdfs:label: replacer
